title: Crypto-Jews and the Infiltration of the Church and Governments
text:
By Mike Clinton
Wednesday, January 17, 2018 12:05
 
“Crypto-Judaism is the secret adherence to Judaism while publicly professing to be of another faith; practitioners are referred to as “crypto-Jews”. Wikipedia
JACOB FRANK, ADAM WEISHAUPT, AND AMSHEL ROTHSCILD
Jacob Frank, the Kabbalist successor of Sabbatai Zevi entered into an alliance formed by Adam Weishaupt and Meyer Amshel Rothschild called the Order of the Illuminati. The objectives of this organization of Crypto-Jews was to infiltrate and undermine the world’s religions and power structures, in an effort to usher in a utopian era of global communism, which they would covertly rule by their hidden hand: the New World Order. Using secret societies, such as the Freemasons, their agenda has played itself out over the centuries, staying true to the script. The Illuminati handle opposition by a near total control of the world’s media, academic opinion leaders, politicians and financiers.
THE SCHEME IS TO REMOVE ALL MONARCHIES AND REPLACE THEM WITH SO-CALLED DEMOCRACIES.
As in my other posts this is something preliminary for your consideration. You can verify everything I write just by doing a Google search. I encourage you to do this.
WHEN PAUL WROTE THESSALONIANS THERE WAS A POWER THAT HELD THE MYSTERY OF INIQUITY IN CHECK – THAT POWER WAS IMPERIAL ROME. THIS IS WHAT THE EARLY CHURCH TAUGHT. AS LONG AS THE EARTH HAD IMPERIAL RULE THE MYSTERY OF INIQUITY WOULD BE RESTRAINED.
“And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time.
For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now letteth will let, until he be taken out of the way. 2Th 2: 6-7″
The goal of the Order of the Illuminati has always been to eliminate the Pope and the Kings. They infiltrated the Roman Church and began overthrowing kings. The French Revolution was one of their schemes as was the Bolshevik /Russian Revolution. When they are successful, and they will be, then the stage is set for the Antichrist.
MORE TO COME, WHEN I HAVE TIME.
